caption.center: SHERRY BARBRO, APPELLANT, v. ANDREW MUELLER, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF CITY OF ST. LOUIS; ROBERT G. DOWD, JR., JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Henry B. Robertson, St. Louis, for appellant.
Larry D. Hale, St. Louis, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before CRANDALL, P.J., and REINHARD and CRIST, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Plaintiff, Sherry Barbro, appeals the jury verdict in favor of Defendant, Andrew Mueller,Page 178 in her personal injury suit. Finding no error of law, we affirm. We further find an opinion in this matter would have no precedential value and affirm with written order. Rule 84.16(b)(5). We have provided a memorandum to the parties for their use only.
